title: 6 - Reality Bites Grief Loss And Dissapointment With God - Guest BonnieLewis
description:
In this episode we interview Bonnie Lewis, who shares her journey of devastating loss and disappointment; we talk about how the christian subculture is uncomfortable with lament and grieving; We bash the idea that suffering is “just God’s plan.” CUSSING ALERT! Bonnie started it, and Mike finished it. EARMUFFS!  As always, please leave your thoughts and questions in the comments below!
